name: Solar System (itch) (gerlac32)
description:
This is Soren Gerlach's solar system model. First, I added all of the planets in the solar system and the Earth's moon; they each have their rotations and sounds. All of them rotate at different speeds; the farther they are from the sun, the slower they orbit. Additionally, I modified both the cameras to fit the entire solar system in the frame. Lastly, I rotated the main camera up so that you could see all of the planets simultaneously as they orbit the sun.

Created by: Soren Gerlach
